name: Bowling 2
description:
Play as a brave red bowling ball and venture through five different levels, while defeating evil bowling pins, to save the bowling ball princess!

Bowling 2 is a unconventional bowling game. Instead of a boring sports game🤢, we have transformed bowling into a cool platformer😎.

This game was a school project and was made by the group "Motståndarna" (7 members total).

All code and 3d modeling are made by us. Some of the textures used are taken from unity asset store or other sources. Sound effects and music are taken from Freesound and OpenGameArt.

--- Controls ---

WASD - X-Z movement

Space - Jump

Mouse - Move camera

Left click/control - Dash

Escape - Pause
